Colin Powell , a retired Army general, said he won't decide whom to vote for until he sees all the candidates. Right now I do not see on the Republican side any one individual who I think is going to emerge at the top of the pile, he said, adding he thinks Barack Obama `` is doing a good job right now.'' CONGRESSWOMAN Gabrielle Giffords 's condition has been upgraded from critical to serious, Tucson's University Medical Centre said today. The hospital said the change was made because she is no longer on a ventilator. It reported she continues to do well. Earlier today, her friend Senator Kirsten Gillibrand said Ms Gabrielle Giffords had improved to the point where she could move both sides of her body, including her arms and legs.
